reviews.review_msg: I really enjoyed this course. The prof really knows the subject well. 2 midterms and 1 final - that's it, no paper! Really good format. This course was graded on a curve, which I liked. Study and go to class and you'll do well. I found that I had to read the textbook fully and take notes to do well.

Classes are boring: reads off the slides and shows too many youtube videos. You can pretty much skip lecture all together because her powerpoints are useless too. Tutorials are useless but mandatory. Her exams are hard (likes the tricky m/c). Great class though but if you can, take the class with a different prof!

She's really nice, but her lectures are insanely boring. Reads directly off the slides so attendance is not mandatory. Her exams are fair for a 300 level psych course, study & you'll do well. Tutorials are completely useless but worth 25% of your grade :(

She is a nice instructor but her exams are far too difficult. If you do not think her way then you will not pass the written part. Majority failed the written part which was unexpected. Majority of this class did poorly, students complained, and the grades were scaled but that didn't help much. Ask for clarification or take another instructor.
Interesting teacher but exams far too difficult; she had to scale the grades, which is something I haven't had done in a upper division psyc course yet!
Dr. Young is a really nice person. she expects a lot of work but is very personable.
very knowledgeable prof. very patient, and the lecture was so interesting. tests could be hard though.

this class was interesting...and yes, her lectures are repeats of the text but it's good b/c she makes the material more understandable. her notes are perfect b/c she highlights the important points and if u memorize them, u will do really well in this course. one of my favorite profs thus far =)
awesome teacher!  Follows book closely so very consistent. Very knowledgeable and approachable. Tests are very clear and fair, no surprises at all.  Best class I've taken at SFU.  highly recomended!!

This class looked interesting but became incredibly boring. Save yourself some time and just read the text...her lectures are a repeat. Test are hard and even if you think you know the material, she will ask questions in a way that makes you feel like you don't. Bad class!!!
All you're getting in her class is a repeat of the text aside from case studies and videos. Textbook info, textbook style. Rather boring.

Great teacher! Lectures a lot from the book but really know what she is talking about.  Great to listen to someone who has so much knowlegde in her field and can tie in relevant example to everything.

Dr. Young is awesome! She is kind of a hard-ass, and really takes her subject seriously, so don't take her class if you just want an easy arts credit. But she is very accessible and great when you meet with her outside of class. This lady is really smart!
I can't believe how boring this woman is!
